attributes.action: Once the EU exit terms are negotiated, hold a referendum to 'accept' or 'reject'
attributes.additional_details: The EU has clearly stated that admission to the EU free trade zone and control of population movement within the EU are mutually exclusive. However this was one of the fundamental promises of the 'leave' campaign.
attributes.background: The recent Brexit referendum will result in a deal between Britain & the EU. However the 'terms' may be worse than the current membership terms. The British public deserve the right to decide.
